TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Malawi, title = Malawi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malawi} }

S.FORM: Malawi hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 30 S, 34 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 118,484 sq km (maki' tay 100ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 94,080 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 24,404 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 18,570,321. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 59.20%, lhlahuy hya' ga 34%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 6.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Lilongwe. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 6 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Peter Mutharika, aring ryax 31 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Malawi hya' ga cyox maki' tay 13 30 S, 34 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 118,484 sq km (maki' tay 100ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 94,080 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 24,404 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 18,570,321. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 59.20%, lhlahoy hya' ga 34%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 6.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Lilongwe. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 6 na tay mtzyo' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Peter Motharika, aring ryax 31 sqo byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2014 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
